Class GymGUI

java.lang.Object
GymGUI
public class GymGUI extends Object
A class containing all the code for user interface along with their functionality for a Gym Management System. This class handles the creation of the GUI components and implements all the functionality for managing gym members.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Shulav Shakya

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GymGUI()
    Constructor for GymGUI Initializes all GUI components and sets up the main application window Adds sample members for testing purposes

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    activateMemberMembership()
    Activates the membership for a specified member Prompts for member ID and activates their membership if found Shows appropriate messages for success/failure
    void
    addPremiumMember()
    Adds a new premium member to the system Validates all required fields and checks for duplicate member IDs Creates a new PremiumMember instance with the provided information
    void
    addRegularMember()
    Adds a new regular member to the system Validates all required fields and checks for duplicate member IDs Creates a new RegularMember instance with the provided information
    void
    calculateMemberDiscount()
    Calculates discount for a premium member Checks if the member has paid the full amount Shows the discount amount or remaining payment amount
    boolean
    checkMembers()
    Checks if there are any members in the system
    void
    clearField()
    Clears all input fields in the GUI Resets text fields, combo boxes, and radio buttons to their default state
    void
    deactivateMemberMembership()
    Deactivates the membership for a specified member Prompts for member ID and deactivates their membership if found Shows appropriate messages for success/failure
    void
    displayMembers()
    Displays all members in the system Shows detailed information for both regular and premium members Opens a new window with the member information
    void
    loadFromFile()
    Loads member data from a file Reads the saved text file and reconstructs member objects Restores both regular and premium members with their attributes
    static void
    main(String[] args)
    Main method to start the application
    void
    markMemberAttendance()
    Marks attendance for a specified member Prompts for member ID and marks their attendance if found and active Shows appropriate messages for success/failure
    void
    payDueAmount()
    Processes payment for a premium member Validates the payment amount Updates the member's payment status Shows remaining amount or success message
    void
    revertPremiumMember()
    Reverts a premium member's status Prompts for member ID Resets the member's data if found Shows appropriate messages for success/failure
    void
    revertRegularMember()
    Reverts a regular member's status Prompts for member ID and removal reason Resets the member's data if found Shows appropriate messages for success/failure
